I highly recommend this game for anyone who wants to get good at first person shooters. This game greatly improves aim and helps people develop lots of in-game skills such as game sense, aim, strategy, teamwork, and communication. Definitely my favorite game of all time out of a game library of 50+ games including non-steam games.
